alert.note: Alert for Lee (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 8:24AM EDT until May 08 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River at Heidelberg. * WHEN...From this morning to tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 19.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is rising above flood stage at this time and will continue rising to a crest of around 20.8 feet this evening. The river will then recede and should fall below flood stage by late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 20.8 feet on 04/23/1931. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued by 2 PM EDT this afternoon.
